## Loading the data

```{r}
gilby_data <- read_csv("../Data/gilby.csv")
glimpse(gilby_data)
```


```{r}
Gilby
```

## Plotting the data

```{r}
vcd::structable(Dullness ~ Clothing, data = Gilby) %>% 
  addmargins()
vcd::structable(Dullness ~ Clothing, data = Gilby) %>%
  vcd::mosaic()
vcd::mosaic(Gilby, 
            gp = shading_max, direction = "v",
            main = "Intellingence relation to Clothing",
labeling = labeling_border(
                varnames = c("F", "F"), 
                rot_labels = c(90,0,0,0), 
                just_labels = c("left", 
                                "left", 
                                "left", 
                                "right"))) 
```
